sen.j: 石井邦猷（いしい くにみち、天保8年6月13日 (旧暦)（1837年7月15日） - 明治26年（1893年）2月3日）は、幕末から明治にかけての官僚。
sen.e: Kunimichi ISHII (July 15, 1837 - February 3, 1893) was a government official from the end of Edo period to Meiji period.
Kunimichi ISHII (July 15, 1837 - February 3, 1893) was a government official from the end of Edo period to Meiji period.
Kunimichi ISHII (July 15, 1837 - February 3, 1893) was a government official from the end of Edo period to Meiji period.
Common name is Torao.
His common name was Torao.
sen.cmt: 文頭と時制を訂正しました。
sen.e: His common name was Torao.
A feudal retainer of Hiji domain in Bungo Province.
A feudal retainer of Hiji domain in Bungo Province.
A feudal retainer of Hiji domain in Bungo Province.

sen.j: 明治維新後に陸軍に入り中佐。
sen.e: He entered the army as a Lieutenant Colonel after the Meiji Restoration.
He entered the army as a Lieutenant Colonel after the Meiji Restoration.
He entered the army as a Lieutenant Colonel after the Meiji Restoration.

sen.j: 明治政府で警察官僚となる。
sen.e: He became a government official of police in Meiji Government.
He became a government official of police in Meiji Government.
He became a government official of police in Meiji Government.

sen.j: 1869年（明治2年） 軍務官に出仕
sen.e: He served in the Department of Military Affairs in 1869.
He served in the Department of Military Affairs in 1869.
He served in the Department of Military Affairs in 1869.
He became a Major in 1871.
He became a Major in the Army in 1871.
sen.cmt: in the Armyを追加しました。
sen.e: He became a Major in the Army in 1871.
He became a chief of the Correction Bureau in 1881.
sen.cmt: 監獄局の定訳不明の為、現在の矯正局として訳出しました。(法務省ＨＰを参照)
sen.e: He became a chief of the Correction Bureau in 1881.
He became a chief of the Correction Bureau in 1881.
He became a prefectural governor of Mie Prefecture in 1885.
He became a prefectural governor of Mie Prefecture in 1885.
He became a prefectural governor of Mie Prefecture in 1885.

sen.j: 1888年（明治21年）6月 佐賀県知事に就任
sen.e: He assumed a prefectual governor of Saga Prefecture in June, 1888.
He assumed a prefectual governor of Saga Prefecture in June, 1888.
He assumed a prefectual governor of Saga Prefecture in June, 1888.

sen.j: 1889年（明治22年）12月 元老院議官
sen.e: He became a councilor of the Senate in December, 1889.
He became a councilor of the Senate in December, 1889.
He became a councilor of the Senate in December, 1889.

sen.j: 養子に外務大臣 (日本)となる石井菊次郎がいる。
sen.e: He had an adopted child, Kikujiro ISHII, who became the Minister of Foreign Affairs (Japan).
He had an adopted child, Kikujiro ISHII, who became the Minister of Foreign Affairs (Japan).
He had an adopted child, Kikujiro ISHII, who became the Minister of Foreign Affairs (Japan).
